title: US Fed Rate Cut: What Does It Mean For Indian Stock Markets?
description: The US Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points on Wednesday while lowering the target range to 4-4.25%. This marked the first time the Fed has cut rates this year, which may have ramifications for the Indian stock market as well. “Job gains have…
